text:
USER: how does he connect

ASSISTANT: [THINKING]
The user is asking how cloud-gateway connects to the NFS shares on node 181. I should explain the connection process clearly.

Node 181 (csmcloud-server) will be running the NFS server with the exports configured. Cloud-gateway will mount these NFS shares over the Tailscale network using the Tailscale IP 100.110.82.181.

Let me provide clear step-by-step instructions for cloud-gateway to connect.
